text:
Get Your First Look At the Vanderpump Rules Season 6 Show Open

See what's buzzing on #PumpRules, #RHOA, #BelowDeck, and more.

Bottoms Up! The Vanderpump Rules Crew Is Serving Up a Tasty Season 6 Sneak Peek: 5 Clips You Need to See

We are just days away from the new season of Vanderpump Rules and, yes, you can bet we're very excited to see what the SURvers and Lisa Vanderpump are up to in Season 6. And if you're like us and can't wait until December 4 for the new season to kick off, we have a lovely little sneak peek at the show open to hold you over. Check it out above. We're breaking down some of the buzziest moments in The Daily Dish Morning After.

How to Watch Watch Vanderpump Rules on Peacock and the Bravo app.

1 . Vanderpump Rules

Pour yourself a Pumptini (or two) and count down the minutes until December 4 when the new season kicks off at 9/8c.

2 . Below Deck

Bruno Duarte Gets Burned

Things took a scary turn for Bruno Duarte during this week's charter.

3 . Love Is In the Air

Kate Chastain Compares Nico and Bri to Eddie and Rocky

Your chief stew has some thoughts about some memorable Below Deck romances.

4 . The Real Housewives of Atlanta

Porsha Williams Explains What it Means to Be a "Baby Vegan"

Let Porsha Williams explain to you what it means for her to be a vegan.

5 . Relative Success with Tabatha

Your First Look at 'Relative Success with Tabatha'

Prepare yourselves: Tabatha. Coffey. Is. Back!

Check back every morning as we'll be recapping the 5 must-see moments from the night before. And don't forget to tune into The Daily Dish podcast to get the latest on what's happening in the Bravo galaxy, currently available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Google Play, and Amazon's Alexa.
title: Vanderpump Rules Season 6 Opening Credits Video
